tool.name: Flapjack PedVerStats
tool.description: run pedigree verification of F1s (known parents) analysis on a dataset
tool.command: java #if $adv_opts.show_advanced -Xmx$adv_opts.memory #end if -cp $__tool_directory__/lib/flapjack.jar jhi.flapjack.io.cmd.GeneratePedVerF1sStats -m $map -g $genotypes -f $parent1 -s $parent2 -o $output #if $simulate_f1.simulate_f1_selector == False -e $simulate_f1.expectedF1 #end if #if $adv_opts.show_advanced $adv_opts.allChromosomes $adv_opts.collapseHets -M "$adv_opts.missingData" -S "$adv_opts.hetSep" $adv_opts.transposed $adv_opts.decimalEnglish #end if #if $create_project -p $project #end if

param.name: map
param.label: Flapjack map file
param.help: Flapjack-formatted (tab-delimited text) input file of map data

param.name: genotypes
param.label: Flapjack genotype file
param.help: Flapjack-formatted (tab-delimited text) input file of genotype data

param.name: parent1
param.label: Index of parent 1
param.help: The index of the first parent in the genotype file

param.name: parent2
param.label: Index of parent 2
param.help: The index of the second parent in the genotype file

param.name: simulate_f1_selector
param.label: Simulate expected F1 (or use F1 from file)
Index of expected F1
param.help: The index of the donor parent in the genotype file

param.name: allChromosomes
param.label: Duplicate all markers onto a single 'All Chromosomes' chromosome
param.help: Imports the data so that an additional 'All Chromosomes' chromosome is created, containing every marker in the dataset held together.

param.name: collapseHets
param.label: Don't distinguish between heterozygous alleles
param.help: Ignores phase between heterozygous alleles, treating, for example, A/T the same as T/A.

param.name: missingData
param.label: Missing data string
param.help: Alleles with missing data are encoded using this string. Clear the box to use an empty string for missing data instead.

param.name: hetSep
param.label: Heterozygous allele separator string
param.help: Specifies the string used to separator heterozygous alleles (eg 'A/T'). Clear the box to specify no string is used (eg 'AT')

param.name: transposed
param.label: Genotype data has been transposed
param.help: Flapjack's default format has markers as columns. Select this to specify markers as rows instead.

param.name: decimalEnglish
param.label: Force English-style decimal marks
param.help: Always process input data using '.' as the decimal separator, irrespective of this Galaxy server's locale settings.

param.name: memory
param.label: Memory
param.help: How much memory to use (larger files may require more memory).

param.name: create_project
param.label: Also create Flapjack project file
param.help: Creates an additional Flapjack project file containing the pedigree verification of F1s (known parents) results.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Flapjack is a multi-platform application providing interactive visualizations of high-throughput genotype data, allowing for rapid navigation and comparisons between lines, markers and chromosomes.
Flapjack documentation_
.. _documentation: http://flapjack.hutton.ac.uk/en/latest/command_line_support.html#pedverf1stats-exe-jhi-flapjack-io-generatepedverf1sstats
